Body:
"""Test using d/dt max extrapolated value for ignition delay.
        """
a, b, c = [51329.3528, 0.316147043, 0.0105018205]
times = np.linspace(0, 1, 10000)
mass_fraction = a * np.exp(-((times - b) / c) ** 2)
time_max_dfdt = b - np.sqrt(1 / 2) * c
dfdt_max = -2 * a / c ** 2 * (time_max_dfdt - b) * np.exp(-(b -
    time_max_dfdt) ** 2 / c ** 2)
ignition_delays = simulation.get_ignition_delay(times, mass_fraction,
    'species', 'd/dt max extrapolated')
assert np.allclose(ignition_delays[0], time_max_dfdt - a * np.exp(-((
    time_max_dfdt - b) / c) ** 2) / dfdt_max, rtol=0.0001)
